item.description:
Learn the Basics of the Myers-Briggs, which type you are, and how to communicate well to all 16 types. The Myers-Briggs is a must to understand people and it covers many bases the Enneagram doesn't touch. It's also the most widely known personality system in the world.

Workshop ends at 10pm.
Option to end between 9:30-10pm

Herb Pearce has been teaching the Myers-Briggs for 15 years and the Enneagram for 20 years. He uses both systems in his counseling and personal coaching practice. He does phone consults (typing, relationship support, decisionmaking, emotional support) and teaches both systems to groups, organizations, churches, schools, companies. He is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram.
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, corner of Tanager and Wollaston and West St.
item.name: Myers-Briggs
